page.title: 17CHANGES IN BARNARD CASTLE
page.content: Since the army left,several pubs have closed and the rest have had to offer more.The two cinemas have closed and less demand have forced the standed of rented property to rise.The Youth Custody Centre has helped replace population and jobs."The Bank",once a trouble area,has improved with five antique shops,a designer knit wear shop and three restaurants.Many girls married soldiers.The social patterns of the town have had to change.Many young people of the town think there are not enough leisure facilites and not enough jobs.Some people think the town needs a swimming bath and sports hall.Others object to the cost of it. The design and position of the new supermarket is causing concern,as is the large,new factory building at Glaxo.Recently tree felling has also upset some people.
